articles.title: Monty Python star Neil Innes dies aged 75
articles.description: Monty Python writer and actor Neil Innes has died aged 75, his agent has confirmed
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
Monty Python writer and actor Neil Innes has died aged 75, his agent has confirmed.
The comedian and musician died of natural causes Sunday night, agent Nigel Morton said.
